<template>

            dark="false"
            >

                width="100%"
                class="d-flex pa-4"
                >
                    <v-avatar>
                        IP
                    </v-avatar>
                </v-card>
                
            </v-overlay>
        </v-card>
    </v-container>
</template>

<script>
export default {

    data() {

            colors: {
                vid_bg: "#322d31"
            }
        }
    },
}
</script>
